statements: ALTER TABLE WasteManagement ADD COLUMN collection_date DATE
ALTER TABLE WasteManagement MODIFY COLUMN disposal_location VARCHAR(100)
ALTER TABLE WasteManagement DROP COLUMN disposal_method
ALTER TABLE waste_collection ADD COLUMN weight DECIMAL(10,2);
ALTER TABLE waste_disposal ADD COLUMN disposal_method VARCHAR(255);
ALTER TABLE waste_disposal ADD COLUMN disposal_cost DECIMAL(10,2);
ALTER TABLE WasteCollection ADD COLUMN collection_type VARCHAR(50);
ALTER TABLE WasteType ADD COLUMN type_description TEXT;
ALTER TABLE WasteDisposal DROP COLUMN disposal_location;
ALTER TABLE waste_collection ADD collection_type VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE waste_bins ADD bin_type VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE waste_recycling ADD recycle_status VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE waste_collection_locations ADD COLUMN location_type VARCHAR(20);
ALTER TABLE waste_collection_schedule ADD COLUMN next_collection_date DATE;
ALTER TABLE waste_bins ADD COLUMN is_overtime BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false;
